author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3088 "split-package" problem for wicket bundles started in an osgi container
Now it uses maven-dependency-plugin to unpack the resources from the dependendies (-core, -util and -request).
This way it is possible to re-generate META-INF/MANIFEST.MF to add the OSGi headers.

author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3088 "split-package" problem for wicket bundles started in an osgi container
Update maven-bundle-plugin (OSGi related) to its latest stable version.

author: dennisl
msg: o Refactoring: move the downloading of tickets from Trac to its own class.
